meanings.definition: A person who is not present or in attendance.
meanings.sent1: The teacher marked the absentees in the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent2: The school had many absentees due to the flu outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The party was quiet without the absentees.
meanings.sent4: The room felt empty, like a world without absentees.
meanings.sent5: The absentees left a noticeable gap in the classroom.

meanings.definition: The state of being away or not present.
meanings.sent1: The absentees were missed during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The absentees caused a delay in the project.
meanings.sent3: The park felt lonely in the absence of the absentees.
meanings.sent4: The house echoed with the presence of the absentees.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of absentees lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The team will absentees two key players in the next match.
meanings.sent2: The report will be incomplete if we absentees crucial data.
meanings.sent3: The garden seemed to absentees colorful flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile absentees warmth and joy from the room.
meanings.sent5: The painting absentees a touch of elegance without the final brushstroke.
